A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw it last night and still feel hungover. I just don’t get why they trashed this film with the ending and killed off too many characters without reason. I have no idea what the franchise has in store going forward but I wouldn’t want to be in JJ’s shoes for anything. After all the hype\, after all the waiting\, I honestly felt like there was no need to ever see another star wars film again when I first walked out of the theater.
